Create the metadata for a new application.

Source: R/build.R
construct_app_metadata.Rd

This information is also used to construct the application log entry.

Usage

construct_app_metadata(app_info = load_job_info(open = TRUE))

See also

Other build-dev: as_filename(), copy_files(), create_rprofile(), create_rproject(), get_latest_entry(), get_valid_opts(), in_tmp_env(), open_doc_and_wait(), set_project_paths(), str_to_filename(), truncate_string(), validate_id(), validate_status(), write_app_metadata()

Examples

data(example_job_metadata)
app_df <- construct_app_metadata(app_info = example_job_metadata)
app_df_concise <- dplyr::select(app_df, -dplyr::ends_with(c("path", "url")))
app_df_concise
#>   id base_id               period      company       position recruiter_email
#> 1 AB       / 2024-07-data-science Company Name Data Scientist               /
#>   status date_created last_updated date_applied date_seq notes
#> 1    ipr   2024-08-27   2024-08-27            /       01     /
